comment: I got the Pfizer too and I was fine after my second! I had some fatigue and body aches, but no fever or anything. My arm hurt like a bitch tho lol

                  :mod (t / too))
            :op2 (f / fine-04

                        :op1 (s / second
                              :poss ii))))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01

                              :part (a4 / arm))
                        :quant (s2 / some))
                  :op2 (a5 / ache-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :mod (b / body)))
            :ARG2 (o / or
                  :polarity -
                  :op1 (f3 / fever)
                  :op2 (a6 / anything)))
      :snt3 (h / hurt-01

            :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01

            :ARG2-of (l / laugh-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :manner (l2 / loud))))

comment: So I guess I'm actually not feeling super great right now but my body never handles things well. I'll keep updating but yeah , my body HURTS now. I'm nervous for the second round but I would take this over covid any day. Definitely still worth it.
